alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lapeer County through 230 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Metamora, or near Lapeer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dryden and Lum around 200 PM EDT. Imlay City around 205 PM EDT. Almont around 210 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Attica, Thornville and Goodland Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
